rules_text:
[i]Ultimate Qigong –[/i] Damage dealt by Inscrutable Teach can't be prevented.
[i]Lifesaving Fists – [/i]Whenever Inscrutable Teach deals noncombat damage rejuvenate 3. [i](Exile three cards from your graveyard, then you may play a permanent card with mana value 3 or less from among them until end of turn.)[/i]
